content: hobbii pattern nr 2503-243-6488 the playful raya kerchief is your new four-in-one fashion bestie knit in luxuriously soft alpaca blend yarn it s the accessory that adds the fancy without the fuss wear it as a trendy kerchief a classic necktie a cozy headband or even a stylish belt - the possibilities are endless the compliments will roll in when you sport your handmade raya kerchief measurements width 8 cm / 3 25 length 132 cm / 52 materials 1 skein of divina color 04 circular needle 5 5 mm 50 cm /us 9 20 cable needle tapestry needle scissors measuring tape
